creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi
description: round clock at left, with hands at 8:05; "NAKAHASHI" at bottom center of clock face; white card with "8:00" written on it in red at right; received dry mounted
image_copyright: © Kenji Nakahashi %2F Center for Creative Photography%2C Arizona Board of Regents
signed: below LLC on mount in pencil: A.P. \"8 o\'clock\" (B) | below LRC on mount in pencil: K. Nakahashi
text: In this series, artist Kenji Nakahashi considers the fluid nature of time, defining it as a series of approximations or estimates made increasingly absurd by his efforts to measure it. Using scales, signs, and other comparative material to assert the “time” depicted on each clock, Nakahashi conveys the impossibility of capturing time, or even fixing a moment in memory.
title: 8 "O'Clock" (B)
